com.software.reuze

Class gb_SurfaceFunctionSphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.gb_SurfaceFunctionSphere
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gb_i_SurfaceFunction

    public class gb_SurfaceFunctionSphere
extends Object
implements gb_i_SurfaceFunction
    This implementation of a SurfaceFunction samples a given gb_Sphere instance when called by the gb_SurfaceMeshBuilder.
